short_summary: Amendment to Solicitation Closing Time. Required supporting documentation for Subscription Agent Services to National Defence. Proposed contract period is for one year with two option periods. The title is Subscription Agent Services for National Defence.
description:
The Fort Frontenac Library has a requirement for the purchase of Subscription Agent Services. 

The following libraries and institutions were invited to participate in this procurement: 

* Department of National Defence (DND) 

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) 

* Department of National Defence (DND) - DND is the main end-user, while the audit purposes require certification from PSPC - no bidding will be conducted.
full_summary:
Γ







### Notice Details

|  **Notice Title** | **Procurement Title** |
| :--- | :--- |
| W2027-24KN65 | Subscription Agent Services |

### Tender Details

|  **Document Reference Number** | **Notice Reference Number** |
| :--- | :--- |
| WS4430094637-Doc4430224999 | WS4430094637 |

### Tender Status

|  **Notice Status** | **Notice Status** |
| :--- | :--- |
| Expired | Expiré |

### Contract Overview

The Solicitation is seeking a firm to act as a Subscription Agent on behalf of the Fort Frontenac Library (National Defence) for the acquisition and management of publications, electronic content, and access to the Electronic Resource Management Platform.

#### Key Contract Requirements

*   Acquisition and management of publications in various formats
*   Delivery and support of electronic content
*   Access to the Electronic Resource Management Platform

#### Proposed Contract Period

*   One-year contract period from the contract award date
*   Two one-year option periods

### Notice Posting Information

|  **Posting Date** | **Closing Date** | **Solicitation Number** |
| :--- | :--- | :--- |
| 2024-02-05 | 2024-02-20 14:00:00 EST | WS4430094637 |

### Trade Agreements

*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Note

Please disregard the initial Ariba Discovery posting response deadline and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bids must be submitted by 20 February 2024 at 14:00 EST.
